actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to convey the Fairport National Fish Hatchery to the State of Iowa.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey to the State of Iowa, without reimbursement, all right, title, and interest of the United States in the Fairport National Fish Hatchery in Iowa. Requires that the property revert to the United States if it is used for any purpose other than fishery resources management.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to convey the Fairport National Fish Hatchery to the State of Iowa.
